titlestmt.titleproper: Robert Robertson inventory of medieval Scandinavian coins, circa 1928
titlestmt.author: Arnold Tescher

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Robert Robertson inventory of medieval Scandinavian coins
did.abstract: List of medieval Scandinavian coins acquired by the ANS.

daodesc.p: Part of an entry from the inventory

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Twenty-page list of medieval Scandinavian coins acquired by ANS in 1928 through the Robert Robertson Fund listing the coins, corresponding reference numbers, and their contemporary values (see 1929.103).

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: A prominent collector of Swedish numismatics, Robertson served as Assistant Curator and photographer for the ANS for much of the 1930s.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Robert Robertson inventory of medieval Scandinavian coins, circa 1928, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
